biography: Shane Morrisun is a multi-talented Producer and Director based in Park City, Utah. Shane started with the goal of becoming an actor. However, the more projects he found himself working on, both in front of and behind the camera, the more excited he became about working on and creating projects of his own. Shane started acting as a child in California and landed his first television guest starring role when he was 11 on a series from Willie Aames (Buddy from Charles in Charge) called BibleMan. He moved to Utah a couple years later in 1996. He continued with his training and theater work in high school and took film acting classes from UVU after graduating. He got married and had his first child, and after being scammed by a local acting agency, He took a break from acting to work in several various jobs to support his growing family. He slowly returned to acting 15 years later starting with a few background roles in various feature films and television, then got another agent and started auditioning again. H
name: Shane Morrisun
